vsParam:
Uh? There's a carriage coming to the Academy everyday,
I can see carriages basically everyday...

Yeah. The carriages transport the medicines and items
made by the Academy to other places.

And... Let me think about it,
some of them as guests coming to visit the teachers.

Basically, only one carriage comes to the Academy
if there's no emergency.

Your tone suggests that you feel strange about it,
maybe you don't use carriages in Colseit?

No... Hot air balloons are the main vehicle in Colseit.
Air traffic there is more developed than the ground traffic here.

In most occasions, people and other things are transported
with hot air balloons.

Wow, so amazing!
I also want to take a hot air balloon and fly in the air!

What are you talking about?
You can flying in the air, with your wings.

There's a difference!
Logy, Logy, can you make a hot air balloon?

Even if it's a small one,
I am so eager to take a hot air balloon ride!

Ah, that's not fair, Peppermint!
I want to take that ride too!

Ha-ha-ha, well... Hot air balloons float up when we inflate
gases lighter than air into the balloons.

If you only want a toy-sized balloon,
it can be easily made as long as we have necessary parts.

So it means, we can make a small hot air balloon
if we could produce the gas needed using alchemy!

That's great! Please make the gas for me, [px]!
Hot air balloon, hot air balloon!

Oh, ohhhhhh! This is a hot air balloon!
That's so amazing!

It should be able to float if we take out the weight
inside the basket... How's that?

Oh, whoa! Hya... Wow!
Wow——! It flies, I am flying!

I said you can fly without the hot air balloon...
But, the hot air balloon is really wonderful...

H, hey! In this case, why don't we work a bit harder
and make a hot air balloon big enough for all of us?

Oh, yeah! As long as we could gather enough materials,
and produce sufficient gas...

No, we are only capable of making such a small
one with our current capabilities.

Rigorous design and calculation are needed
if we want to make one that can hold people.

It would be extremely dangerous if we can't guarantee the safety.
First of all, we need to make the design document.

And then, we must investigate the wind direction and
topography around the Academy...

That sounds so, so interesting!
You are really knowledgable, Logy!

Ah ha ha...
This thing somehow becomes complicated.

Yeah... The materials must reach a certain level of strength,
and the precision of the materials and synthesis must...
I, I can't understand even a word...
I don't think that's even possible...

What?
It's not hard to understand at all...

Really? Only the design is complicated,
I believe that [px] can make it...

No, wait... The first thing to investigate should be the natures
of substances in this world that can be used as materials...

Ah, ah ha ha...
It seems unrealistic for us to take a hot air balloon...
